title: 100 Years Ago
subtitle:
[November 28, 1919] 

After WW1, Greek and Serbian refugees return home from Bulgarian internment camps. They travelled 500 miles in this cramped freight car. On the left is a British nurse working with the American Red Cross to care for the refugees. pic.twitter.com/je1iVfamCv
